alert.note: Alert for Southeastern Orangeburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 09 at 8:29PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Orangeburg County through 900 PM EDT... At 828 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Bowman, or 11 miles north of Saint George, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Holly Hill and Bowman. This includes the following highways... Interstate 26 between mile markers 160 and 169. Interstate 95 between mile markers 85 and 91. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
